net.proteusframework.core.text

Class FriendlyDateFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • java.text.DateFormat
        • net.proteusframework.core.text.FriendlyDateFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FriendlyDateFormat
extends java.text.DateFormat
    A DateFormat to format dates differently depending on the age of the date to format from the current time. For example, this class allows referencing the current date as "Today". This class is not thread safe.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
